A

Action_Card - Class in uno.cards
The Action_Card class provides an UNO action card.

Create an UNO Action Card.
addCard(UNO_Card) - Method in class uno.cards.Deck
This method allows a card to be added to the top of the UNO Deck.
addCard(UNO_Card) - Method in class uno.cards.Hand
addCard adds the specified card as the top card in the Hand.

Deck - Class in uno.cards
Deck provides a standard deck of 108 UNO cards.
Deck() - Constructor for class uno.cards.Deck
Constructs a new shuffled deck of 108 UNO_Cards.
discardCard(UNO_Card) - Method in class uno.uno_game.Game_Engine
The method discardCard should be called by the player in order to play a card by placing it on the discard pile.
doIDraw() - Method in class uno.uno_game.Game_Engine
The doIDraw method should be called by a player when they see a DRAW_2 card or a WILD_DRAW_4 card in order to determine if they need to draw cards.
DRAW_2 - Static variable in class uno.cards.Action_Card
Constant defining a DRAW 2 card.
drawCard() - Method in class uno.uno_game.Game_Engine
The drawCard method should be called by the player when they need to draw a card from the deck.

F

Face_Card - Class in uno.cards
The Face_Card class defines a UNO face card.
Face_Card(int, int) - Constructor for class uno.cards.Face_Card
Constructs an UNO face card of the given color and with the specified number.

G

Game_Engine - Class in uno.uno_game
The Game_Engine class conducte a simulation of the card game UNO using the official rules that ship with an UNO deck.
Game_Engine(int) - Constructor for class uno.uno_game.Game_Engine
The Constructor for Game_Engine sets up the UNO simulation to play the indicated number of games.
getAction() - Method in class uno.cards.Action_Card
Returns the type of action this card represents.
getColor() - Method in class uno.cards.UNO_Card
This method returns the color of the card.
getColorAsString() - Method in class uno.cards.UNO_Card
getColorAsString returns the color of the card as a string object.
getCurrent_Color() - Method in class uno.uno_game.Game_Engine
The getCurrent_Color method may be called by the player in order to check the current color of play.
getFaceNumber() - Method in class uno.cards.Face_Card
This method returns the number on the face of the card.
getFirstCard() - Method in class uno.cards.Hand
This method returns the first or top card in the Hand.
getLastCard() - Method in class uno.cards.Hand
This method returns the bottom or last card in the Hand.

N

notifyPass(Player) - Method in class uno.uno_game.Game_Engine
The notifyPass method should be called by the player when they do not discard a card.
notifyUNO(Player) - Method in class uno.uno_game.Game_Engine
The notifyUNO method must be called when a player has only one card remaining in their hand after discarding a card.
notifyWon(Player) - Method in class uno.uno_game.Game_Engine
The notifyWon method should be called by a player when the last card in the player's hand is discarded.
numberOfCards() - Method in class uno.cards.Deck
This method returns the number of cards in the Deck.
numberOfCards() - Method in class uno.cards.Hand
This method returns the number of cards in the player's hand.
numberOfCards() - Method in class uno.player.Player
The numberOfCards method reports the number of cards in the player's hand.
numCards4EachPlayer() - Method in class uno.uno_game.Game_Engine
The method numCards4EachPlayer returns an array containing the number of cards in each player's hand with the exception of the player making the call.
